item.description:
Please join us at the Center of Light Boston for a Saturday evening workshop about Mother Mary.

Mother Mary is a powerful being, Who loves everyone. Her heart can hold us all. It does not matter who we are or where we have been. I want to introduce you to Her, for those of you who have not yet met Her. For those of you who already know Her, I would like you to come and share in Her peace and joy. She heals all hearts that desire this. Come and be glad!

This workshop is $15, but if you mention you're in this Meetup, it's only $10.
item.how_to_find_us: The Center of Light house is located just around the corner from the STONY BROOK "T" stop on the ORANGE line.
item.why: You'll love it because She heals all hearts that desire to know her.
item.name: Workshop: Mary, Mother of us all
